Text:
I vote for a New 52 Week 25 with JL #6 instead of skipping a week!

Thank you for your posts!!
Vote for not skipping JL, Ichitououng. But you still may upload something completely different, too)
If it helps there are actually 5 comics coming out that are (52) related.  Secret Files, The Shade, THUNDER Agents, JL, and Batman Odyssey.  I always vote for consistancy.

I will do what ever you like .. myself if you want to upload only the 1 .. fine.. if not fine i will look for it the following week.
But might i add that if you do that name it with both week names. Just so people know
dont skip a week ichiro. a couple of issues on week 25 will be alright. thanks again for the updates.
Well the people have spoken i will be doing the small week next week Thanx everyone for the feedback
